name: SET - a Twisted Classic
description:
Everyone knows SET.
The old, famous, and classic game, now comes with a twist!

Play SET with 8 unique game-modes (including multiplayer mode), follow your progress with some cool statistics, achievements, leaderboards, and medals!

Invite your friends or find a random player to play in multiplayer mode!

Beautiful minimal design adapted for both light and dark mode.
Play with your favorite colors and enjoy yourself with our confetti.

Super easy to learn, super fun to play.

Ready, SET, Go!
